rows.label: qev085702_MSG0001
rows.name: Sorry for all the cloak-and-dagger business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'd tell you over a drink inside,
but you never know who's listening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0003
rows.name: It's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0004
rows.name: Here, look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0005
rows.name: See this location?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0006
rows.name:
Apparently it's become home to a pack
of very dangerous indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0007
rows.name: That's not good. That's a FrontierNav probe site.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0008
rows.name:
If they damage the probe,
it'll make it harder to collect miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0009
rows.name: Bingo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0010
rows.name:
And check out how much old handlebar-stache
is offering to make sure that doesn't happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0011
rows.name: What the what?! I've never seen such a high reward before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0012
rows.name:
He's obviously thinking this mission
will require 10 teams or more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0013
rows.name: Ah, so that's why... Bummer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0014
rows.name: It's a way smaller number when you split it 10 ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0015
rows.name: Buuut...it seems the job isn't public yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0016
rows.name:
A particularly...ambitious team could swoop in and take
the whole thing for themselves. Assuming they lived, that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0017
rows.name: How did you get this info, anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0018
rows.name:
Sorry, I can't tell you that.
Suffice to say, someone at HQ is not very good at poker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0019
rows.name: Some secret—you just basically told us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0020
rows.name: Okay, well whatever—it's still a juicy tip, ain't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0021
rows.name:
But even I'm not crazy enough to try it alone,
which is why I immediately thought of you guys.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0022
rows.name: So? Whaddaya think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0023
rows.name: Hmm... Any thoughts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_JNK0010
rows.name: Betray

rows.label: qev085702_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest taking the job entirely for yourselves.

rows.label: qev085702_JNK0020
rows.name: Negotiate

rows.label: qev085702_SEL0021
rows.name: Demand 70 percent of the take.

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0024
rows.name: A tempting idea...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0025
rows.name:
All right, let's go for it.
First one to take out all the targets will get the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0026
rows.name: May the best team win. Good luck, Doug.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0027
rows.name:
Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-WHOA now!
Come on, that's not even funny.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0028
rows.name: Joking about stabbing me in the back like that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0029
rows.name: Er, you WERE joking...right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0030
rows.name:
Actually, if you consider the firepower we bring,
that sounds about fair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0031
rows.name:
Now hold on a minute!
Don't forget who found the job in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0032
rows.name:
Look, how 'bout I don't charge for the tip
and we split it fifty-fifty. Okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0033
rows.name:
...Right. Now that that's settled,
let's head out before my team gets suspicious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085702_MSG0034
rows.name: This one's just me and you guys.[ST:wait ]
